CustomField.description: Primary brand color used for theming in the Experience (LWR) site. Store as a hex value (e.g., #RRGGBB or #RRGGBBAA).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a hex color code starting with “#”. Example: #FFAA00 (RGB) or #FFAA00CC (RGBA). Leave blank to use the default theme color.
CustomField.label: Primary Color
